name: vk_atm_withdrawal_reconciliation_results_data
description: This table stores the results of ATM withdrawal reconciliation processes, comparing transaction data from two sources to ensure consistency and accuracy.

columns.name: vikki_from_account_number
columns.description: The account number from which the withdrawal was made, as recorded in the Vikki system.

columns.name: vikki_amount
columns.description: The amount of money withdrawn, as recorded in the Vikki system.

columns.name: vikki_transaction_timestamp
columns.description: The date and time when the transaction occurred, as recorded in the Vikki system.

columns.name: vikki_currency
columns.description: The currency in which the transaction was conducted, as recorded in the Vikki system.

columns.name: vikki_external_reference_id
columns.description: An external identifier for the transaction, as recorded in the Vikki system.

columns.name: vikki_channel
columns.description: The channel through which the transaction was conducted, as recorded in the Vikki system.

columns.name: vikki_tid
columns.description: The identifier for the ATM terminal used, as recorded in the Vikki system.

columns.name: vikki_from_bank_name
columns.description: The name of the bank from which the withdrawal was made, as recorded in the Vikki system.

columns.name: vikki_posting_timestamp
columns.description: The date and time when the transaction was posted, as recorded in the Vikki system.

columns.name: vikki_source_account_name
columns.description: The name associated with the source account, as recorded in the Vikki system.

columns.name: vikki_narrative
columns.description: A narrative description of the transaction, as recorded in the Vikki system.

columns.name: vikki_rtf_posting_type
columns.description: The type of posting for the transaction, as recorded in the Vikki system.

columns.name: vikki_rtf_type
columns.description: The format type of the transaction, as recorded in the Vikki system.

columns.name: vikki_auth_code
columns.description: The code used to authorize the transaction, as recorded in the Vikki system.

columns.name: vikki_from_cif_number
columns.description: The customer identification number associated with the source account, as recorded in the Vikki system.

columns.name: hdb_channel_id
columns.description: The identifier for the channel through which the transaction was conducted, as recorded in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_from_cif_number
columns.description: The customer identification number associated with the source account, as recorded in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_from_account_number
columns.description: The account number from which the withdrawal was made, as recorded in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_account_type
columns.description: The type of account from which the withdrawal was made, as recorded in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_amount
columns.description: The amount of money withdrawn, as recorded in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_currency
columns.description: The currency in which the transaction was conducted, as recorded in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_transaction_timestamp
columns.description: The date and time when the transaction occurred, as recorded in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_rrn
columns.description: The retrieval reference number for the transaction, as recorded in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_tid
columns.description: The identifier for the ATM terminal used, as recorded in the HDB system.

columns.name: hdb_external_reference_id
columns.description: An external identifier for the transaction, as recorded in the HDB system.

columns.name: reconciliation_result
columns.description: The result of the reconciliation process, indicating whether the transaction data matched between systems.

columns.name: to_bank_name
columns.description: The name of the bank to which the funds were transferred.

columns.name: transaction_direction
columns.description: The direction of the transaction, indicating whether it was an inflow or outflow.

columns.name: id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the reconciliation record.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the reconciliation process was run.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: The date and time when the reconciliation record was last updated.
